name: Kuiper
description:
An anomaly causes valuable crystals to appear in the depths of an asteroid belt. It is up to you to collect as much of the rare resource as you can!

Pilot a deep space mining vessel by touching your screen on the left and the right. This may sound easy but it gets challenging quite quickly; not only must you avoid treacherous asteroids but your own treasure as well!

An arcade dodging and collecting game made in collaboration with Matthew Weekes.
